content:
Check:
  all:
    - any:
        - name: TXPARMCD
          operator: equal_to
          value: DOSENDTC
        - name: TXPARMCD
          operator: equal_to
          value: DOSSTDTC
    - name: TXVAL
      operator: invalid_date
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.243
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trial Set Parameters that include dates are required to be presented
  according to the international standard ISO 8601
Outcome:
  Message: The value of TXVAL is not in ISO 8601 date/datetime format
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '243'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Trial Set Parameters that include dates are required
                  to be presented according to the international standard ISO 8601
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TX

json.Description: Trial Set Parameters that include dates are required to be presented according to the international standard ISO 8601

Outcome.Message: The value of TXVAL is not in ISO 8601 date/datetime format

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Trial Set Parameters that include dates are required to be presented according to the international standard ISO 8601
